metadata.title: Clear Glass Reading Glasses Real Glass Lenses in Stylish Acetate Frame Available in Reading Magnification +0.25 to +3.00 (+2.50)
features: CRYSTAL CLEAR- High Quality Glass Lenses
RELIABLE- Reduce eye strain, reduce distortion, and are scratch resistant. Now you don't have to worry about scratching the lenses when you drop the frame!
DURABLE- Chemically tempered to meet dress eyewear impact standards. Also has a top grade acetate frame for ensured durability.
COMFORTABLE- Spring hinges add an additional layer of comfort. Has a classic design and works great for all day wear.
description: The G502 reading glasses are high quality real glass reading glasses. Made with Schott German Glass, these lenses bring true HD vision. The real glass lenses offer the highest quality optics on the market, in addition, they are scratch resistant and extremely durable, bringing more comfortable to use. Also, the crystal clear vision reduces eyestrain and eye fatigue. This rectangular frame is made with top acetate, which makes our high quality frame both lightweight and comfortable, bringing the classic look perfect for males and females. Plus, this black fade clear stylish frame has a single bridge and spring hinges, so you will be sure our frame will stay secure for long time use. Our G502 Real Glass Reading Glasses have a wide range of magnifications to perfectly fit your needs without compromise your style.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "6 x 2 x 2 inches; 2.4 Ounces", "Department": "unisex-adult", "Date First Available": "October 3, 2017", "Manufacturer": "KRT Distributions"}
